meanings.definition: To offer or present as a gift or sacrifice.
meanings.sent1: She will alay the flowers at the altar.
meanings.sent2: They alay their gratitude by helping others.
meanings.sent3: During the ceremony, they alay fruits to the gods.
meanings.sent4: The team decided to alay their time for a good cause.
meanings.sent5: He alays his love through acts of kindness.

meanings.definition: A type of Filipino offering or ritual.
meanings.sent1: The alay was beautifully decorated with flowers.
meanings.sent2: During the festival, they prepare an alay for the ancestors.
meanings.sent3: She made an alay of food for the spirits.
meanings.sent4: The alay symbolizes respect and honor.
meanings.sent5: The community gathered around the alay in reverence.

meanings.definition: A style of music or dance originating in the Philippines.
meanings.sent1: The alay dance is performed during special occasions.
meanings.sent2: The rhythmic beats of the alay music filled the air.
meanings.sent3: She learned the traditional alay dance from her grandmother.
meanings.sent4: The alay performance was a celebration of culture.
meanings.sent5: The alay music echoed through the streets.
